content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could assist you in finding a hostel that fits your needs. Booking a hostel is a great first step in planning your trip to Barcelona.

Remember to read reviews, check the hostel's policies, and book in advance to ensure availability. Once you've booked your hostel, you can start planning your itinerary, and I'll be happy to help you with that whenever you're ready.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you a fantastic trip to Barcelona, and I'm sure you'll have an amazing time exploring this incredible city!

¡Hasta luego!
